ecsTaskDefinitionReadOnlyRootFilesystem.^description: You have not enabled 'Read-only root file  system' for every container in a Task definition. Give containers read-only access to root file system. Modifications are not allowed to the root file system.

ecsTaskDefinitionTaskIAMRole.^description: ECS Task Role does not align with IAM principle of least privilege, IAM roles should be more restrictive instead of providing Administrator Access or Full Access to AWS Service.

ecsTaskDefinitionTaskExecutionIAMRole.^description: ECS Task Definition Roles does not align with IAM principle of least privilege, IAM roles should be more restrictive instead of providing Administrator Access or Full Access to AWS Service.
